reviews.review_msg: I don't want to continue with Chinese anymore, she makes it very difficult to learn. She's nice but she doesn't really care much if you improve or not. There's a lot of work involved and the blog thing is just ridiculous. She said she MAY or MAY NOT mark it but she encouraged us to update it...

I took her class. I felt the way she teaches was unclear. I cannot understand why every one must buy her home-made $35 textbook.I reather prefer buying textbooks published by universities.It's much more useful.I didn't see any point of taking this class to improve chinese. She was too picky, never give you full mark for any assignment.

I took a few classes w/ her & I have to say that I've never hated any prof this much.She pretends to be a goddess but if she hates u, u r doom. Me, never done anything wrong, attend every class on time, done all my works, I swear w/ my own life, but she just hated me. She will try to pick on me. All I can say, she plays favoritism, so I was unlucky
